liturgicalDay.title: Solemnity of the Assumption of the Blessed Virgin Mary

alternates.label: Readings for the Mass during the Day (shown)

sections.heading: Responsorial Psalm
sections.antiphon: The queen stands at your right hand, arrayed in gold.
verses: Daughters of kings are among your ladies of honor.
On your right stands the queen in gold of Ophir.
Hear, O daughter, consider, and incline your ear.

sections.heading: Alleluia
sections.reference: Mary is taken up to heaven; a chorus of angels exults.
sections.text: Alleluia, alleluia. Mary is taken up to heaven; the hosts of angels shout for joy. Alleluia.

sections.heading: Saint of the Day
sections.name: The Assumption of the Blessed Virgin Mary

provenance.textSource: DR (public domain) or null if unavailable
